=== Key Styles ===
* '''Body Background:''' rgb(255, 255, 255)
* '''Body Font:''' -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
* '''Heading Color:''' rgb(31, 35, 40) 
* '''Link Color:''' rgb(9, 105, 218)

=== Usage Guidelines ===
* Use Primary (#0969da) for primary actions and links
* Use Success (#1a7f37) for positive feedback and success states
* Use Danger (#cf222e) for errors and destructive actions
* Use Warning (#bf8700) for caution and warnings
* Maintain the system font stack for optimal readability across platforms
